entries.description: The winter has historically been an asset for Russian war efforts. This time, however, experts say it could spell disaster for Vladimir Putin's troops.

entries.title: Ukraine Peace Proposals: What Are the Chances?
entries.description: Eleven months into Russia's full-scale invasion, key actors appear to be looking for ways to end the fighting.

entries.title: Where Was 'The Traitors' Filmed? Shooting Location Revealed
entries.description: While the various twists and turns on "The Traitors" have hooked viewers, it is the stunning backdrop of the game that has really got fans talking.

entries.title: How U.S. Scientists are Collaborating with China's Military: "Wake-Up Call"
entries.description: A new study shows U.S. and allied scientists are helping China's military as it strives to build an army that cannot be defeated.

entries.title: Hannity Floats Theory Biden 'Inner Circle' Might Not Want Him in 2024 Race
entries.description: Hannity linked Biden's recent classified documents discoveries to claims that Democrats are trying to block the president's 2024 ambitions.

entries.title: Mega Millions Had 6.1 Million Winning Tickets, 16 Millionaires on Tuesday
entries.description: Still, none of them hit the jackpot, which soars to a whopping $1.35 billion this Friday.

entries.title: Kremlin Knows Russia Is Failing in Ukraine: U.K.
entries.description: British intelligence wrote in a briefing that the recent scramble in Russia's military leadership is a sign of Putin's discontent for its recent failures.

entries.title: Republicans Mocked Over Outraged Claims Government 'Coming for' Gas Stoves
entries.description: Representative Ronny Jackson was among the Republican lawmakers wrongly suggesting that the Biden administration has plans to confiscate gas stoves.

entries.title: The Bipartisan Public Has Spoken, and George Santos Should Quit: Poll
entries.description: Santos told reporters on Wednesday that he will not respond to calls for his immediate resignation.

entries.title: Images Show Soledar Before and After Devastating Destruction During War
entries.description: The town of about 10,000 residents "is what madness looks like," Zelensky said.

entries.title: What Is Basal Cell Carcinoma? Jill Biden Has Cancerous Lesions Removed
entries.description: Basal cell carcinoma is the most common form of skin cancer.

entries.title: 'Guitar Genius' Jeff Beck's Sudden Death Stuns the Rock Music World
entries.description: Beck, who rose to fame as part of the Yardbirds and the Jeff Beck Group, died Tuesday, according to a statement from his official Twitter account.

entries.title: FBI Under Pressure to Raid Biden's Home After Second Set of Documents Found
entries.description: Republicans including Donald Trump Jr. and Kimberly Guilfoyle are demanding that the FBI raid President Joe Biden's homes to search for more documents.
